website_summaries.verdict: The Brooks Addiction Walker Suede is crafted to provide the needs of people with motion control issues like those with flat feet or overpronation. It is equipped with the PDRB technology that aids in steadying the feet as they go through the motions of walking. The suede top securely locks the foot, adding to the cozy experience. It comes highly recommended for people who do a lot of walking or standing up for long periods.
pros: A lot of people with flat feet or pronation issues highly recommend the Brooks Addiction Walker Suede
Many believe that this Brooks walking shoe is made using quality materials and quite durable
Multiple owners are delighted with how light this product feels on their feet
According to several individuals, the shape of the sole unit facilitates smooth forward movements
A good number of reviewers who need custom orthotics appreciate the removable insole
For a walking shoe, this model looks really good, says many shoppers
cons: Some consumers thought that the Brooks Addiction Walker Suede was too pricey for a walking trainer
A few users didn’t like that the foam under the forefoot wasn’t too thick because they can feel the ground when they’re walking

customer_reviews.title: narrow toe box a good 1/2 too small over priced
customer_reviews.text: limited toe box size off, too small, brooks given up quality as all the others too Over priced, down grade down size! most customers would probably pay more to get the quality of the past! Apparently, the "number crunkers" don't agree with that theory, give them less and they will buy it anyway!
customer_reviews.author: jcb

customer_reviews.title: Half Size Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 11.5 first, way too small. My big toe scraped the toe box pretty hard. I ordered the 12 next, perfect sized! These shoes are comfortable and don’t look too shabby either. They get docked a star because the size should have been correct from the get go, I’m always an 11.5 in sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Shem Ishler

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Non slip. I can wear them to work. Cons: 1. Not very supportive. Disappointing from Brooks. 2. Very overpriced considering lack of support.
customer_reviews.author: sai2sword9

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were fine but didn’t like having to pay sales tax
customer_reviews.text: Pennsylvania doesn’t charge sales tax on clothing and shoes, but I was charged sales tax. I feel that this was an error and feel that the sales tax should be refunded. I thought that it was going to be corrected once I completed the transaction, but that did not happen. The shoes themselves were very nice and the fit was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Judy H

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fits prefect... Size is very accurate for large guy feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Brooks is a great brand!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them! He put them on and begged me to go for a walk with him so he could try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Christal

customer_reviews.title: Toe box too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Toe box too narrow. Feels more like at 2EE vs 4EE.
customer_reviews.author: Jay K. Din

customer_reviews.title: Ok but I was expecting more
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable shoes but for that price I was expecting them to have a better cushion like the Revel 3 or any other Brooks model honestly. Besides that they are ok, overpriced but I'm keeping them for work
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I returned shoes. I wear 11 to 12 in shoes, but often buy 13 in athletic shoe to allow for inserts, thick socks etc. I would have need a 14 or an extremely wide 13 in this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Keep on walking, in comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and supportive. Great for walkers. My husband swears by them and he walks 10 miles a day!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi L. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: One size too small, order one size bigger than you usually wear.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is made cheaper than earlier Brooks shoes and it is one size off. I wear a size13, but had to order a size 14 to wear them. They look good and feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This a great comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This a comfortable light shoe for working 8hrs a shift.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Amen

customer_reviews.title: comfortable but..
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable but not to be worn if you are walking over 4 miles
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Casey

customer_reviews.title: Buy these shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. I have been wearing running shoes for walking for many years with various results. I started wearing these just a week ago and my walking performance and comfort has improved tremendously. I bought them for those reasons and especially for the look which is more athletic shoe like.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money or the hassle. Stiff and firm. Get Asics.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.J

product_meta.title: Brooks Mens Addiction Walker Suede Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: Sometimes it's good to slow down and enjoy the scenery. This walking shoe pairs great support with slip-resistant soles so nothing catches you off-guard.
